Description: Postcard; real photographic card, hand coloured; shows the quay at Port Said, Egypt, with assorted small boats in the foreground and properties behind, many with prominent advertising or billboard displays, including Thomas Cook & Sons, Simon Arzt, Horlicks, Wills' Gold Flake Cigarettes and the Eastern Telegraph Company.
Producer name: Published by: Thomas of Fleet Street
Curator's comments: Real photographic card; very good condition; postally used but the stamp has been previously soaked off. Bondfix series. The card is inscribed with a message dated 12th March 1963 and reads: "Darling Barbara, I am sitting on the A deck in warm lovely sunshine. I am quite sunburned. Next going ashore will be Saturday, 16th, in Aden. Much love, Granny".
